item.description:
Real World Obedience/Distraction Workshops, Wednesdays at 11:30am!

Do you and your dog know (some of) the basics? Have you ever said "she listens at home" or "he does it without other dogs around?" Would you like to have better control under heavy (or any!) distraction? Or are you an experienced handler who would like to work your dog & proof what you've already got?

THENNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN........................

This is the workshop for you! Meeting every Wednesday at 11:30am at 182 Hayden Rowe Street in Hopkinton, MA (01748) - unless otherwise noted! This 'shop will cover attention, sit, down, stand, stay, come, heel, take it, drop it, leave it, place, finish, wait, proper greetings & a surprise or two (... or three...!) Whether or not your dog knows these commands yet or not is irrelevant. ~~~ ALL BREEDS, AGES & LEVELS WELCOME! ~~~ We will work your dog at whatever level he/she is at, and you will see progress every week! Even if you are proficient in all of these commands, come test yourself, push your limits and gain ultimate focus under crazy distractions, including crowds, noise-makers, traffic, food, obstacles & more!

Cost is $15 per dog per class. Participants are welcome to bring in your own "distractions" where feasible if there is something specific you would like to work on your dog's skills around!

PARKING IS UNFORTUNATELY ON-STREET ONLY, TO THE RIGHT OF MY DRIVEWAY IF YOU ARE FACING IT, THEN WALK AROUND BACK (BACKYARD) W/YOUR GEAR & YOUR DOG.

Bring:
> 4-6 foot fixed lead (NO flexis)
> supply of soft, smelly, bite-sized treats
> tug toy (optional)
> hungry canine!
> dog on a securely-fitted collar/harness or combo thereof

Email justcassie101@gmail.com or call (774) 327-4669 with any questions. No commitment or advanced notice necessary!
item.how_to_find_us: Gray apt. building w/fire escape facing st., almost directly across from the blinking yellow light
item.name: Real World Obedience/Distraction Workshops, Wednesdays at 11:30am!
